item.title: The role of simplicity in testing and automation
item.description: Disclaimer: Don’t take this too seriously … this is “thinking-in-progress” :) It just struck me the other minute, how simplicity is the key theme behind two very important areas in software development, that I’ve been dabbling with quite a bit recently: Testing, and automation. Have you thought about how testing, in its essence, is: Wrapping complex code, which you can’t mentally comprehend completely, in simple code, that you can mentally comprehend, at least one test at a time.
